text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/81ed4960482f8baabdd7f95b4d5e39744be88ae7|patch 8.2.1731: Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list>
patch 8.2.1731: Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list.
Solution:   Copy the list instead of extending it. (closes #6998)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1731: Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list · vim/vim@81ed496
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1731: Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list · vim/vim@81ed496
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot use += to append to empty NULL list. Solution: Copy the list instead of extending it. (closes #6998)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/04bdd573d0a48e789eb92ed2a81e0dd732761391|patch 8.2.1730: Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type>
patch 8.2.1730: Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type

Problem:    Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type.
Solution:   When type is unknown us "any". (closes #6997)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1730: Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type · vim/vim@04bdd57
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1730: Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type · vim/vim@04bdd57
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: cannot use member of unknown type. Solution: When type is unknown us "any". (closes #6997)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/189832bf661168df7ebd428e4088737718775fbd|patch 8.2.1729: endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter>
patch 8.2.1729: endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter

Problem:    Endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter.
Solution:   Add the ex_normal_busy_done flag.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1729: endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter · vim/vim@189832b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1729: endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter · vim/vim@189832b
attachments.text: Problem: Endless loop when ":normal" feeds popup window filter. Solution: Add the ex_normal_busy_done flag.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c53e9c57a9846655c2d3169788f4beefa6d22d90|patch 8.2.1728: compiler warning for using uninitialized variable>
patch 8.2.1728: compiler warning for using uninitialized variable

Problem:    Compiler warning for using uninitialized variable. (John Marriott)
Solution:   Initialize "neighbor".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1728: compiler warning for using uninitialized variable · vim/vim@c53e9c5
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1728: compiler warning for using uninitialized variable · vim/vim@c53e9c5
attachments.text: Problem: Compiler warning for using uninitialized variable. (John Marriott) Solution: Initialize "neighbor".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/99ca9c4868bb1669706b9e3de9a9218bd11cc459|patch 8.2.1727: a popup created with "cursorline" will ignore "firstl…>
patch 8.2.1727: a popup created with "cursorline" will ignore "firstline"

Problem:    A popup created with "cursorline" will ignore "firstline".
Solution:   When both "cursorline" and "firstline" are present put the cursor
            on "firstline". (closes #7000)  Add the "winid" argument to
            getcurpos().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4f73b8e9cc83f647b34002554a8bdf9abec0a82f|patch 8.2.1726: fuzzy matching only works on strings>
patch 8.2.1726: fuzzy matching only works on strings

Problem:    Fuzzy matching only works on strings.
Solution:   Support passing a dict.  Add matchfuzzypos() to also get the match
            positions. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6947)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1726: fuzzy matching only works on strings · vim/vim@4f73b8e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1726: fuzzy matching only works on strings · vim/vim@4f73b8e
attachments.text: Problem: Fuzzy matching only works on strings. Solution: Support passing a dict. Add matchfuzzypos() to also get the match positions. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6947)

patch 8.2.1725: not all Pascal files are recognized

Problem:    Not all Pascal files are recognized.
Solution:   Add filetype patterns. (Doug Kearns)
